title: Targeted Search Candidate Notice
description: Candidate gamma-ray transient reported from the GBM Targeted Search

loglr.description: Marginalized log-likelihood ratio of the candidate.

earth_angle.description: Angle between the source location and the center of the Earth [deg]

sun_angle.description: Angle between the source location and the center of the Sun [deg]

spectral_class.description: Enum specifying classification of soft or hard spectral classification

follow_up_event.description: Name or trigger time of the external trigger being followed

follow_up_type.description: Type of follow-up being performed, e.g. gw_alert, IceCube Gold/Bronze
